message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $190. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
I'm interested in the product, but $190 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your budget, but $190 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you do $165?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $165 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Can you meet me at that price?
